text: Giridhari (Giri) Lal Tikku (18 August 1925 in Kashmir-14 August 1996) was a Kashmiri linguist and literary scholar and Professor of Persian and Asian Studies at the University of Illinois. He was known for his works on Persian literature. == References == Category:1925 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Kashmir Category:University of Illinois faculty Category:Linguists
title: Girdhari L. Tikku
